title: Recurrent Transformer U-Net Surrogate for Flow Modeling and Data Assimilation in Subsurface Formations with Faults
abstract: Develops a recurrent transformer U-Net surrogate model for fast predictions of pressure and CO2 saturation in realistic faulted subsurface aquifer systems for geological carbon storage.

title: Geometry Aware Operator Transformer as an Efficient and Accurate Neural Surrogate for PDEs on Arbitrary Domains
abstract: Proposes a geometry aware operator transformer (GAOT) for learning PDEs on arbitrary domains, combining multiscale attentional graph neural operator encoders and decoders with vision transformer processors.

title: Sequential Neural Operator Transformer for High-Fidelity Surrogates of Time-Dependent Non-linear Partial Differential Equations
abstract: Proposes S-NOT architecture combining gated recurrent units (GRUs) with self-attention mechanism of transformers for time-dependent, nonlinear PDEs.

title: Reservoir Surrogate Modeling Using U-Net with Vision Transformer and Time Embedding
abstract: Presents a U-Net with Vision Transformer and time embedding for reservoir surrogate modeling, demonstrating effective integration of attention mechanisms in subsurface flow prediction.

title: Implicit factorized transformer approach to fast prediction of turbulent channel flows
abstract: Introduces modified implicit factorized transformer (IFactFormer-m) for surrogate modeling of turbulent channel flows governed by PDEs.

title: Deep surrogate model of groundwater and salt dynamics for optimizing subsurface pipes layout in irrigation areas
abstract: Develops an Attention U-Net surrogate model tailored for subsurface hydrological systems with adaptive loss function for multi-output predictions.

title: A hybrid CNN-transformer surrogate model for the multi-objective robust optimization of geological carbon sequestration
journal: International Journal of Greenhouse Gas Control
abstract: Presents a hybrid CNN-Transformer surrogate model for multi-objective robust optimization of geological carbon sequestration.

title: Characterization of groundwater contamination: A transformer-based deep learning model
abstract: Proposes a transformer-based deep learning model for identifying the release history of groundwater contaminants.

title: An efficient strategy of Bayesian optimized attention-enhanced LSTM surrogate model and its application in groundwater pump-and-treat remediation
abstract: Proposes BO-LSTM-Attention model combining Bayesian optimization with attention-enhanced LSTM for groundwater remediation modeling.

title: Physics-guided deep learning surrogate model with graph attention for long-term radionuclide transport prediction in deep geological repositories
abstract: Presents GAT-PGDL model combining graph attention mechanisms with physics-informed deep learning for radionuclide transport in geological repositories.

title: Unisolver: PDE-Conditional Transformers Towards Universal Neural PDE Solvers
abstract: Presents Unisolver that conditions Transformers with PDE information to solve a wide scope of PDEs as efficient surrogate models.

title: Accelerated training of deep learning surrogate models for surface displacement and flow, with application to MCMC-based history matching of CO2 storage operations
journal: Computer Methods in Applied Mechanics and Engineering
abstract: Evaluates performance of surrogate models including Fourier neural operators and transformer U-Net for CO2 storage history matching.

title: Integrating Physical Parameterization and Attention Mechanisms in Recurrent Neural Networks for Hydrological Modeling
abstract: Presents PRNN model integrating attention mechanisms with physical process-wrapped RNNs for enhanced hydrological modeling.

title: Geometry-Informed Neural Operator Transformer
abstract: Introduces Geometry-Informed Neural Operator Transformer for machine-learning-based surrogate modeling of PDEs.

title: Machine learning surrogates for efficient hydrologic modeling: Insights from stochastic simulations of managed aquifer recharge
abstract: Compares ML architectures including vision transformers for variably saturated groundwater flow in managed aquifer recharge.
